Posts.Content: Does anyone have breast soreness and sharp pains after completing radiation? I have been experiencing both of these and wonder if it is common?
Posts.Title: Radiation after-effects

Posts.Content: Thank you Owlgram. My surgeon didn't recommend radiation, but my oncologist strongly recommended it. I, too, wish I had known about the side effects. I also had early stage BC with no lymph node involvement. My oncologist is going to recommend Tamoxifen and I am pretty strongly against it given the side effects.
Posts.Title: Radiation after-effects
